Package view

Package that contains the views of the project, based on the MVC paradigm; developed using Vaadin 8.1.5.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddDlvPointWindow
    This class creates the pop-up window that manages the adding of a delivery point.
    AddPaymentWindow
    This class creates the pop-up window that manages the adding of a method payment.
    CartView
    This class creates the view of the cart of the user.
    checkOutView
    This class creates the view of the checkout.
    HomeView
    this class creates the homepage, where the user can proceed to the search.
    LoginView
    This class creates the login view.
    MainView
    This class creates the structure of the website (HorizontalSplitPanel), initializating the vertical menu and the navigator, that is related to the second component of the split panel.
    ProfileView
    This class creates the view for the profile of the user.
    PurchaseConfirmedView
    This class creates the view that confirms the purchase.
    RegisterView
    This class creates the view for the registration.
    SearchResultsView
    This class shows the results of the search requested by the user.
    UserInfoLayout
    This class creates the layout containing the informations of the logged user.
    UserListsLayout
    This class creates the lists of payment methods and delivery points of the logged user.
    VerticalMenu
    This class creates the vertical menu on the left of the page.

Package view Description

Package that contains the views of the project, based on the MVC paradigm; developed using Vaadin 8.1.5.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Paolo D'Arienzo
